评论概述: Not as much quality as the photo, but not bad
评论详情: EDIT: So, I got the larger size like I wanted (large). It fit exactly how I wanted it to, and strangely looked exactly like the picture even though the mediums did not. I can't really complain cuz I like how they look, but just a heads up! If you want it to look exactly like the picture, order a large!!!  They definitely do fit to size. I got the size that I normally would, as I've never bought pants on amazon before, and they fit perfectly but I really wanted that baggy look instead. I'm returning it for a bigger size, so get a bigger size if you want it to be baggy! The button hole also wasn't cut open, so you have to cut it open yourself. The stars on the pants aren't made with as much quality as the photos, but they're not that bad and still cool looking if you don't mind the grungey look! Overall, yeah, I like them.
Don’t buy this not at all like the picture and I will be returning

My son really loved these jeans, but we've been trying to get the smell out of them since we opened the bag they came in. I've washed them twice, now hanging them outside to see if we can get the smell out. My son says it smells like "tires". I've never smelled anything like it on denim.
